35.
*-
(c) How could a price structure be devised or
accepted in a community unaccustomed to
print?
(d) If engineers introduce mass production Into
India* or Africa* or Russia* before printing
and reading are taken for granted* how can
commodities be sold in an non-existent market?
(£) is communism the inevitable consequence of
introducing machine production before print¬
ing, reading* price systems and uniform
commodity markets?
(f) Does the reader of print present the aspect
of "consumer”?
